problem.markdown:
>>Which district has the lowest HIV test positivity rate? (Hint: You may want to turn off the boundary layer)<< [[Insect District, Sweet District, (Dessert District), Vegetable District]]
[explanation] Dessert District has the lowest HIV test positivity rate [explanation]
